text: The 2013 Ekayana Monastery bombing was a terrorist attack that occurred in Jakarta, Indonesia on August 4, 2013 at 6:53 p.m. It targeted a Buddhist monastery named Ekayana in Jakarta. This bombing caused injuries to three people. ==References== Ekayana Monastery bombing Category:Terrorist incidents in Indonesia Category:2010s in Jakarta Category:Crime in Jakarta Category:Islamic terrorism in Indonesia Ekayana Monastery bombing Ekayana Monastery bombing Category:Persecution of Buddhists
title: 2013 Ekayana Monastery bombing
